game.name: DCS: A-10C II Tank Killer
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: DCS: A-10C II Tank Killer is the follow-on to the renowned DCS: A-10C Warthog, and it brings many improvements and new additions like the latest weapons, a helmet-mounted sight, and new graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DCS: A-10C II Tank Killer is the follow-on to the renowned DCS: A-10C Warthog, and it brings many improvements and new additions like the latest weapons, a helmet-mounted sight, and new graphics.
